attributes.action: Stop the Closure of Swimming, Librarys and Gym Facilitys in Miles Platting
attributes.additional_details: This is a petition to try and stop the closure of the Library, Swimming Pool and Gym Facilities in Miles Platting, This is used by many of the residents of the area and now because of cuts they are closing these facilities down, Apparently there will be replacement facilities built but not till 2013 and they won’t be in the area, so we need to fight to keep this in the area so as few people as possible are affected by these cuts!! The government cuts are ridiculous; they are cutting cost by closing things that benefits us as paying residents of the area.
